if(NOT ${SFML_MODULE} STREQUAL "")
	set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${SFML_MODULE}" ${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH})
endif()

set(SFML_STATIC_LIBRARIES OFF CACHE BOOL "Determines whether SFML is linked statically")
find_package(SFML 2 REQUIRED system window)

set(GAME_ENGINE_INCLUDE ${GAME_ENGINE_INCLUDE} ${SFML_INCLUDE_DIR} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(GAME_ENGINE_DEP_LIBS ${GAME_ENGINE_DEP_LIBS} ${SFML_LIBRARIES} ${SFML_DEPENDENCIES} PARENT_SCOPE)
if (SFML_STATIC_LIBRARIES)
    set(GAME_ENGINE_DEFINITIONS ${GAME_ENGINE_DEFINITIONS} -DSFML_STATIC PARENT_SCOPE)
endif()
